DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare pharmacokinetic ( PK ) response inhale insulin administration 3 different inhalation regimens subcutaneous insulin administration .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacologic Response Safety Inhaled Insulin Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: This first-in-human trial investigate optimal particle size absorption Dance-501 , aerosolize liquid human insulin inhalation ( INH ) . Twelve subject type 1 diabetes receive INH dose ( 50 IU ) use inhaler 4 visit 6 U insulin lispro ( LIS ) sc separate visit ass relative bioavailability ( FREL ) INH . The inhaler configure generate insulin aerosol particle size 3.5-4.0 μm ( low output mesh ; LOM ) , 4.3-4.8 μm ( medium output mesh ; MOM ) 5.0-5.5 μm ( high output mesh ; HOM ) low inspiratory flow . To assess within subject variability , MOM use twice . Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) measure 8 hour dose .
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes mellitus treat multiple daily insulin injection continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion total daily insulin dose le 1.2 units/kg/day . Body mass index 18.0 28.0 kg/m2 . Hemoglobin A1c less equal 9 % . Forced vital capacity force expiratory volume one second least 75 % predict normal value race , age , gender height . Fasting Cpeptide le 0.3 nmol/L . Subjects condition possibly affect drug absorption lung , particular subject decrease lung function subject take bronchodilator subject smoke . Active chronic pulmonary disease . Any clinically significant major disorder diabetes mellitus . Decompensated heart failure time angina pectoris within last 12 month acute myocardial infarction time . Proliferative retinopathy severe neuropathy .
